text: Lasianthus rostratus is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Kerala in India. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lasianthus rostratus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Lasianthus rostratus
